title: Creamed Pearl Onions with Ham

ingredients.content: 24 oz pearl onions, root end trimmed
4 oz smoked ham, diced (approx. ¼ in.)
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/212°F/speed 1<b>. Add onions and cook <b>10 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Drain onions and pinch to remove skins. Transfer onions to a bowl and set aside. Discard skins.
Place ham, olive oil and butter into mixing bowl and sauté <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved onions, pepper, nutmeg and thyme and cook <b>2 min/195°F//speed 1<b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: Replace ham with diced smoked bacon or pancetta.
Replace fresh pearl onions with frozen pearl onions. If frozen onions are peeled and trimmed, omit cooking, draining and peeling the onions and begin by sautéing ham and add onions with cream.
Garnish with more freshly ground black pepper, nutmeg or thyme.
